directions: In a microwave safe bowl, mix the oil-based butter spread, garlic, soy sauce, pepper, and parsley
Cook 2 minutes on High in the microwave, or until oil-based butter spread is melted.
Arrange tofu on the baking pan, and coat with the oil-based butter spread mixture, reserving some of the mixture for basting.
Broil tofu 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until juices run clear, turning occasionally and basting with remaining oil-based butter spread mixture
